ComicInfo.Title: All in! Part 2
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: All in! Part 2: Dr. Mindbender's clone of Genghis Khan allies himself with Cobra. The two Snake Eyes fend off Cobra while the other Joes retreat. Genghis threatens to detonate two grenades at Sean and Dawn unless they surrender to him.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 13:04:55. [CVDB946203] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:41:57. [Issue ID 2428484]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Andrew Griffith,Netho Diaz,Andrew Lee Griffith,Netho Diaz
ComicInfo.Inker: Andrew Griffith,Maria Keane,Netho Diaz,Andrew Lee Griffith,Maria Keane
ComicInfo.Characters: Frag Viper,Alley Vipers,Vipers,Laura 343,Genghis Khan (clone),Cobra [Dr. Mindbender,Blue Ninjas,Cobra Commander],Techno Vipers,Incinerators
